metadata.title: Illustrated Guide for Marine Mammals

creators.name: National Science Museum, Tokyo, Department of Zoology, Division of Birds

metadata.description: The Illustrated Guide for Marine Mammals provides web accessible illustration of whales, dolphins and porpoises.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide an illustrated guide of marine mammals.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None
